key_risks: Declining financial performance with reduced revenue and profitability
Client concentration risk due to reliance on a limited number of large clients
Operational inefficiencies affecting service delivery and client retention
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities highlighted by a significant data breach
controversies: Data breach in May 2023 exposing sensitive personal identifiable information
Issues with contract execution and service delivery affecting client satisfaction
social_issues: Potential erosion of client trust due to cybersecurity incidents
governance_issues: Effectiveness of recent leadership changes in addressing financial and operational challenges remains uncertain

sources.title: Conduent Data Breach Investigation - Strauss Borrelli PLLC
sources.snippet: On May 19, 2023, Conduent discovered that it had experienced a data breach in which the sensitive personal identifiable information in its systems may have been accessed and acquired. Through its investigation, Conduent determined that an unauthorized actor may have accessed and obtained this sensitive information, including information belonging to Raytheon customers, on or around May 19, 2023.
